title: Working with Instance Attributes
description: Create a BankAccount class with balance that can be modified
starterCode:
# Create BankAccount class with deposit and withdraw methods

# Your code here

# Test
account = BankAccount(100)
account.deposit(50)
print(account.balance)
account.withdraw(30)
print(account.balance)
solution:
# BankAccount class
class BankAccount:
    def __init__(self, initial_balance):
        self.balance = initial_balance
    
    def deposit(self, amount):
        self.balance += amount
    
    def withdraw(self, amount):
        self.balance -= amount

# Test
account = BankAccount(100)
account.deposit(50)
print(account.balance)
account.withdraw(30)
print(account.balance)
